title: Lemon meringue pie cheesecake
ingredients: ['360g shortbread biscuit crumbs', '55g melted butter', '675g cream cheese', '225g soured cream', '200g caster sugar', '4 eggs', '4 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 lemon, zested', '4 egg whites', '50g caster sugar', '1/4 teaspoon cream of tartar (optional)', '400g lemon curd']
